title: CFP approves new seeding model next season
description: The College Football Playoff is moving to a straight seeding model, giving the top four teams by seed a first-round bye, the CFP committee announced Thursday.
author: Heather Dinich

title: Cavs' Mobley headlines NBA's All-Defensive Team
description: Evan Mobley (Cavaliers), Dyson Daniels (Hawks), Luguentz Dort (Thunder), Draymond Green (Warriors) and Amen Thompson (Rockets) made the NBA's All-Defensive first team.
author: Tim Bontemps

title: Levy's to-do list after paying Postecoglou Â£2m Europa bonus
description: BBC Sport analyses Tottenham's to-do list, from their manager's future, to recruitment plans and the bonuses for European glory.

title: Yes, yes, yes: Man Utd sure on Amorim, transfers and the future
description: A look at what's next for Manchester United after their Europa League final defeat - with focus on transfer plans, finances and the future of their head coach Ruben Amorim.

title: Pep: I'll quit if Man City squad gets too large
description: Pep Guardiola has claimed he would quit as Manchester City boss if he is given too big a squad next season because he cannot bear to leave a large number of fit players out.

title: Littler beats Humphries AGAIN! London calling for Aspinall but MVG out
description: Michael van Gerwen's hopes of reaching the BetMGM Premier League Play-Offs were ended by a red-hot Nathan Aspinall on the final night of league action in Sheffield.

title: Scottie Scheffler eagles first hole, trails rookie John Pak at Charles Schwab Challenge
description: Scheffler began the opening round at Colonial Country Club in eagle-birdie on his way to a 2-under 68.

title: Timberwolves vs. Thunder: Game delayed early after Scott Foster injury, with old nemesis Chris Paul in the building
description: The first foul of Game 2 of the Western Conference finals was Lu Dort on Scott Foster.
author: Jack Baer
